title: Nathiya Nathiya Lyrics Poo Mazhai Pozhiyuthu
stanzas:
<div>
Nathiya Nathiya Lyrics Poo Mazhai Pozhiyuthu

Nathiya nathiya
nile nadhiya
nadhi pol neliyum
nadayaa
idaithaan kodiyaa
kodimel kaniyaa
kondaada naanillaiyaa

Nathiya nathiya
nile nadhiya
nadhi pol neliyum
nadayaa
idaithaan kodiyaa
kodimel kaniyaa
kondaada neeillaiyaa

oru poomazhaithaan
ingu pozhiyuthu paar
nee punnagai purigaiyile

thaen mazhai thaan
kannil valiyuthu paar
nee tharisanam tharugaiyile

mazhai thooralilum
mani saaralilum
udal kulir kondu
thavippathenna

kan padavum nee
kai thodavum konjam
kulirvittu povathenna

raathiriyil nam raajiyathil
oru neerodai paaivathenna
adhuthaan adhuthaan
unakkum enakkum
kondaattam kummaalam

Nathiya nathiya
nile nadhiya
nadhi pol neliyum
nadayaa
idaithaan kodiyaa
kodimel kaniyaa
kondaada naanillaiyaa

oru yaedirukku
kadhai ezhuthivaithu
nee iravinil padippatharkku

yaenguthaiyaa siru
thamarai poo
nee thaenalli kudippatharkku

oru koodirukku
ilam kuruvi vandhu
mazhai kaalathil paduppatharku

paal irukku
malai palamirukku
konda pasiyinai
thanippathrakku

kaal thodangi
malar koonthal varai
un kai vannam kandaal enna

medhuva medhuva
varavaa varavaa
onndu onnaaga.

Nathiya nathiya
nile nadhiya
nadhi pol neliyum
nadayaa
idaithaan kodiyaa
kodimel kaniyaa
kondaada neeillaiyaa

Nathiya nathiya
nile nadhiya
nadhi pol neliyum
nadayaa
idaithaan kodiyaa
kodimel kaniyaa
kondaada naanillaiyaa
